formattedAddress: 107 Suffolk St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 107 Suffolk St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: Forro New York is a fun and friendly way to learn this delicious Brazilian partner dancing. The teacher Rafael is extremely professional, competent and attuned to the class' needs and evolution. I discovered Forro New York about 6 months ago and I look forward to the classes every week, they bring me so much joy. There are also a few regular live Forro events and workshops in the NYC Forro scene and it's really nice to be in touch with the Forro group outside of class and join this lively growing community.

originalText.text:
Forró is so much fun! From day 1 I was greeted with a friendly, fun community and soon was hooked.

Rafael is an A++ instructor. He breaks things down so beginners can catch on easily plus gives more advanced students fun tricks to work with so everyone gets a lot out of every class, and even personalized tips. Then often after class we all go out dancing!

I’ve met some of a lot of cool people dancing forró and have had a lot of fun. Seriously highly recommended for anyone to try!

originalText.text: The Forro New York community is really nice! The teacher, Rafael, has a deep background in music and has a really fun and engaging method. His demos and exercises are really good, and he always has nice observations o how to improve our form and technique. The students are fun, and there are a few places nearby to go dance Forró after class!

text.text: The Forro New York community is really nice! The teacher, Rafael, has a deep background in music and has a really fun and engaging method. His demos and exercises are really good, and he always has nice observations o how to improve our form and technique. The students are fun, and there are a few places nearby to go dance Forró after class!

originalText.text: Rafa is an amazing teacher! Besides teaching us forró steps, he teaches us how to connect to the music and how to listen to the music nuances, he gives us cultural context about the dance moves and fosters a great environment among students. The student community is also great! You get to meet a lot of interesting people who also love to dance.

text.text: Rafa is an amazing teacher! Besides teaching us forró steps, he teaches us how to connect to the music and how to listen to the music nuances, he gives us cultural context about the dance moves and fosters a great environment among students. The student community is also great! You get to meet a lot of interesting people who also love to dance.

originalText.text: I’ve been taking dancing classes my whole life and nothing compares to what I’ve been learning with Rafael. I believe that because he’s a composer and a conductor and his approach to music and rhythm is completely different to what is out there and it has changed the way I dance forever. Not only the way I dance forró, but everything. It changed my perspective. On top of the an amazing classes, the environment is fun, people are awesome. You learn a skill at the same time you make friends for life. Highly recommended!
